=== Current Issues ===

==== Intrepid ====

===== Wired NIC =====

* Kernel 2.6.27-7 Working
* Kernel 2.6.27-11 NOT Working see Bug #<nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/326891|326891]]</nowiki>
* Kernel 2.6.27-14 (from proposed) Working

===== Wireless NIC =====

Kernel 2.6.27 doesn't support the Wireless NIC.
I used the rt2860-dkms_1.7.1.1_all.deb package from http://www.array.org/ubuntu/dists/intrepid/eeepc/binary-i386/.
The rt2860-dkms_1.8.0.0_all.deb package was not working.

==== Notes ====
==== Karmic (Beta) ====
Cannot get the webcam to work at all, but it worked OK in 9.04. Camera device id  details from lsusb 
Bus 001 Device 003: ID 0c45:62c0 Microdia Sonix USB 2.0 Camera

==== Intrepid ====

===== Configuration changes =====

System => Preferences => Appearance => Theme:
 Installed '''Human Compact Small Icons Theme''' from http://martin.ankerl.com/2008/11/04/human-compact-themes-for-ubuntu-810/

System => Preferences => Appearance => Fonts:
 Changed Fonts Size to 9
 Activate '''Subpixel smoothing'''

System => Preferences => Appearance => Fonts => Details...:
 Changed Resolution to 83

File /etc/bash.bashrc:
 Added some aliases for better usability of the shell
  . alias ll="ls -l"
  . alias la="ls -la"
  . alias ..="cd .."
  . alias ...="cd ../.."

===== Wireless =====

For configuring wireless connections I removed network-manager and installed wicd.
